data.title: Company Information
data.meta_description: Company Information Company Information Company NameCog…
data.text:
Contributing to Society through Advanced Technology

Founded in 1988 as Japan’s first artificial intelligence and cognitive science research institute, our company has been providing next-generation technologies to society mainly through government funded R&D projects and licenses to advanced companies. Moving forward, we will continue to utilize cutting-edge technologies such as generative AI, hybrid AI, next-generation machine learning, cybersecurity next-generation networks for emergency response, and cognitive defense. Our goal is to create an environment where people can live safely and securely in an increasingly digitalized society.

Achieving a Sustainable Society

Through the development of advanced technologies, we aim to balance productivity improvement and environmental consideration, striving for a sustainable society where everyone can live a prosperous and happy life.

Dissemination of Knowledge and Technology

By developing various disruptive technologies, including next-generation real-time systems for cyber and cognitive domain warfare, we promote the sharing of knowledge and the spread of advanced technologies, contributing to the overall progress of society.
